channel.title: Free host
channel.description: hai i was woundering if there are any other free hosts apart from freehostia and awardspace that offer a decient ammount of band width an disk space with phpmyadmin ands with preferbly no ads?

item.title: Free host
item.dc:creator: @Exception Exception
item.description:
@Exception wrote:

[quote=“ExLinX, post:4, topic:145528”][quote author=ThugLife link=topic=199288.msg1773917#msg1773917 date=1190508819]
http://webhosting.nationvoice.com - perfect for what you want.
[/quote][quote author=ThugLife link=topic=199288.msg1773917#msg1773917 date=1190508819]
http://webhosting.nationvoice.com - perfect for what you want.
[/quote]
yeah i dont like nationvoice because every time i have tryed regestering i dont get an email, even after 48 hours.

http://www.zendurl.com/
Might not have 99.99% uptime, might not have 30 million users, but it’s the best damn free host I’ve ever used.
[/quote][quote author=Exception link=topic=199288.msg1773934#msg1773934 date=1190509024]
http://www.zendurl.com/
Might not have 99.99% uptime, might not have 30 million users, but it’s the best damn free host I’ve ever used.

kk il give it a go but i found this one, and it looks quite good

English 200 MB Popunder once per user FTP, Browser PHP, SSI Domain or Subdomain Unmetered bandwidth.  Xpanel.  MySQL database, preinstalled phpMyAdmin.  Custom error pages.  File size limit 10 MB.  Statistics.  Php mail enabled.  Email.  Cron jobs.  Addon domains.  Multiple accounts allowed.  Instant free webspace hosting activation.

http://www.ueuo.com/[/quote]
